channel.title: universal bank on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Mercedes-Benz Bank AG Logo Mercedes-Benz Bank AG is a universal bank with seat in Stuttgart. Daimler-Benz founded in 1979 the Mercedes Leasing GmbH and in 1987 the Mercedes-Benz Finanz GmbH. The universal bank was founded under the name DaimlerChrysler Bank in 2001 and obtained a banking license in 2002. The name was changed to Mercedes-Benz Bank in 2008. Source
You can download theMercedes Benz Banklogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Mercedes Benz Bank
item.description: Mercedes-Benz Bank AG is a universal bank with seat in Stuttgart. Daimler-Benz founded in 1979 the Mercedes Leasing GmbH and in 1987 the Mercedes-Benz Finanz GmbH. The universal bank was founded under the name DaimlerChrysler Bank in 2001 and obtained a banking license in 2002. The name was changed to Mercedes-Benz Bank in 2008. Source
